name: An enameled bodice dagger
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'whirlwind attack'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'critical'.
